sys_openapi_operation.name: Get fields paginated

openapi.display_value: The Jira Cloud platform REST API - 1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT

sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get fields paginated","fOperationId":"getFieldsPaginated","fDescription":"Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of fields for Classic Jira projects. The list can include:

 * all fields.
 * specific fields, by defining `id`.
 * fields that contain a string in the field name or description, by defining `query`.
 * specific fields that contain a string in the field name or description, by defining `id` and `query`.

Only custom fields can be queried, `type` must be set to `custom`.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).","fPath":"/rest/api/2/field/search","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the request is successful.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson3180911931","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/PageBeanField","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Returned if the request is invalid.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson2432224544","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ErrorCollection","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the authentication credentials are incorrect or missing.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user does not have the necessary permission.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6768821032","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ErrorCollection","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"startAt","fDescription":"The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"startAt4603565080","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fDefault":0,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"maxResults","fDescription":"The maximum number of items to return per page.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"maxResults4235176127","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int32","fDefault":50,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]},{"fName":"type","fDescription":"The type of fields to search.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"type1558334288","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"type1558334288","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["custom","system"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},{"fName":"id","fDescription":"The IDs of the custom fields to return or, where `query` is specified, filter.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"id7248311179","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":true,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"id7248311179","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},{"fName":"query","fDescription":"String used to perform a case-insensitive partial match with field names or descriptions.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"query3437095417","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"orderBy","fDescription":"[Order](#ordering) the results by a field:

 * `contextsCount` Sorts by the number of contexts related to a field.
 * `lastUsed` Sorts by the date when the value of the field last changed.
 * `name` Sorts by the field name.
 * `screensCount` Sorts by the number of screens related to a field.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"orderBy4366334113","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["contextsCount","-contextsCount","+contextsCount","lastUsed","-lastUsed","+lastUsed","name","-name","+name","screensCount","-screensCount","+screensCount"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"}}]},{"fName":"expand","fDescription":"Use [expand](#expansion) to include additional information in the response. This parameter accepts a comma-separated list. Expand options include:

 * `key` Returns the key for each field.
 * `lastUsed` Returns the date when the value of the field last changed.
 * `screensCount` Returns the number of screens related to a field.
 * `contextsCount` Returns the number of contexts related to a field.
 * `isLocked` Returns information about whether the field is [locked](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/ZSN7Og).
 * `searcherKey` Returns the searcher key for each custom field.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"expand6474672926","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}

1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT">a629c6231b9b28108b08419ead4bcb53</openapi><path>/rest/api/2/field/search</path><serialized_operation>{"fName":"Get fields paginated","fOperationId":"getFieldsPaginated","fDescription":"Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of fields for Classic Jira projects. The list can include:

 * all fields.
 * specific fields, by defining `id`.
 * fields that contain a string in the field name or description, by defining `query`.
 * specific fields that contain a string in the field name or description, by defining `id` and `query`.

Only custom fields can be queried, `type` must be set to `custom`.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).","fPath":"/rest/api/2/field/search","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the the results by a field:

 * `contextsCount` Sorts by the number of contexts related to a field.
 * `lastUsed` Sorts by the date when the value of the field last changed.
 * `name` Sorts by the field name.
 * `screensCount` Sorts by the number of screens related to a field.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"orderBy4366334113","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["contextsCount","-contextsCount","+contextsCount","lastUsed","-lastUsed","+lastUsed","name","-name","+name","screensCount","-screensCount","+screensCount"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"choice"}}]},{"fName":"expand","fDescription":"Use [expand](#expansion) to include additional information in the response. This parameter accepts a comma-separated list. Expand options include:

 * `key` Returns the key for each field.
 * `lastUsed` Returns the date when the value of the field last changed.
 * `screensCount` Returns the number of screens related to a field.
 * `contextsCount` Returns the number of contexts related to a field.
 * `isLocked` Returns information about whether the field is [locked](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/ZSN7Og).
 * `searcherKey` Returns the searcher key for each custom field.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"expand6474672926","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}</serialized_operation><sys_class_name>sys_openapi_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chris.crockett</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-09 23:43:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>8d49c2a71b9b28108b08419ead4bcbad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get fields paginated</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f">984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_openapi_operation_8d49c2a71b9b28108b08419ead4bcbad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chris.crockett</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-09 23:43:17</sys_updated_on></sys_openapi_operation></record_update>
